intro.footnote: *Like 101 other things on your to - do list...

stock.title: Buy a Random Pic on The Stock?
stock.description: If you're okay with heavily used snapshots and managing the license, it's no problem... However, if your interior is unique, it needs a personal touch.

studio.title: Hire a Photographic Studio?
studio.description: Popular photographers follow trends, relying heavily on digital editing and AI. Trends change quickly, making your interior look tacky.

scout.title: Become an Art Scout?
scout.description: This needs time and effort to immerse yourself in the art biz. Doesn't sound very productive, does it?

local.title: Local
local.description: I am taking pictures right here in our neighbourhood. You can easily reach me whenever you need.

madeToOrder.title: Made—to—Order
madeToOrder.description: Point to your favourite spot on the map, and I'll go take a picture. Like it? Great! If not, no worries... But I think you'll be glad you gave me a shot.

noAI.title: No AI, No Photoshop
noAI.description: Each photograph is a piece of craftsmanship.

certified.title: Certified Quality
certified.description: Photographs are printed in limited editions, following museum standards. These aren't just pictures – they're collector's items.

cta.heading: Contact me for a free photo consultation.
cta.subtext: Interested in bringing unique photography to your space or event? Let's discuss how we can create something unforgettable together.

about.name: About
about.title: Want to know me?
about.greeting: Hi! Salam! Peace! I'm a photo artist with Polish roots, based in Norway, specializing in traditional darkroom techniques and handcrafted fine art prints
about.intro2: I am a photo artist with Polish roots, based in Norway and working worldwide

bio.featured: I run Loubna Photo, which focuses on traditional darkroom techniques and handcrafted fine art prints. I hold a higher education degree in photography and multimedia communication.
bio.freelance: As a freelancer, I have worked with magazines, advertising agencies, and private clients, all while pursuing my own artistic projects.
bio.workshops: I have led photography workshops in collaboration with local authorities and cultural centers across Europe.
bio.collaborations: In Norway, I have collaborated with {kulturtanken}, {rogaland}, {jaermuseet}, and {sandnes} and {stavanger} municipalities.
bio.coordination: As a coordinator and manager in the cultural sector, I have worked with internationally renowned artists such as Peter Greenaway, Zbig Rybczynski, Wojciech Fangor, and Leon Tarasewicz.

challenge.heading: Challenge me!
challenge.text: Pick up a location and I will take a photo there. *

bioLink.heading: Curious about my journey?
bioLink.text: Explore the detailed chronicle of my professional path, artistic milestones, and collaborations.

workshop.name: Workshop
workshop.title: Photo Workshops
workshop.tagline: Immersive hands-on creative experiences designed for cultural programs and curious minds alike

intro.question: Do you work in the cultural sector and need a fresh, exciting workshop for your program?
intro.alternative: Or just bored and want to try something new, fun, and hands-on?

video.intro: Watch this video – in just 1 minute, you'll see what you gain by joining our workshop family!

whatsOn.heading: What's On
whatsOn.activity: Building a gigantic camera. Camera Obscura.

consultation.subtext: Interested in bringing a unique photography workshop to your organization or event? Let's discuss how we can create an unforgettable creative experience together.

bio.name: Bio
bio.title: Professional Experience
bio.tagline: A chronicle of professional achievements, artistic milestones, and academic credentials
bio.highlightsIntro: Two decades of photographic artistry, cultural projects, and creative collaboration across Europe.
bio.educationIntro: Formal training in photography, multimedia, and scientific research.

highlights.title: Photo Workshops for Sandnes Municipality
highlights.description: Three-year collaboration focused on conducting workshops on building Camera Obscura, Pinhole Cameras, and darkroom techniques at Varatun Gård.

highlights.title: Follow the Sun.
highlights.description: Solo Photo Exhibition sponsored by Stavanger Municipality.

highlights.title: Enjoy the Ride!
highlights.description: Major shows at Kana Theater in Stettin and the VI International Fair Show in Poznań.

highlights.title: My Place.
highlights.location: Festival of Art 'poMorze Sztuki proForma', Poland.
highlights.description: Work created for an art festival and exhibited during a touring show in Szczecin, Gdańsk and Zielona Góra.

highlights.title: n.i.t.c.
highlights.location: Festival of Art 'poMorze Sztuki przeZtwory'.  Poland.
highlights.description: Work exhibited during a touring show in Szczecin and Gdańsk.

highlights.title: Magnetism.
highlights.location: Festival of New Art  lAbiRynT (Frankfurt); Trans:motion - Group Exhibition (Szczecin)
highlights.description: Project exhibited  during a touring show in Frankfurt and Szczecin.

highlights.title: Itsaso.
highlights.location: The Gate Jazz Cafe, Stettin, Poland

highlights.title: Originator and Coordinator
highlights.description: A six-month Polish-German collaboration project, where artists from both countries were invited to create works focused on the identity of place. Szczecin, Poland; Berlin, Germany

highlights.title: President and Co-founder
highlights.description: Over three years, the association hosted lots of cultural and sports events, along with workshops that got kids and teenagers involved.

highlights.title: home_less
highlights.description: Project created as an artistic debut for the 5th International Festival of Visual Arts "inSpiracje: Space", Szczecin, Poland.

highlights.title: Project menager
highlights.organization: 5th Internasional Festival of Visual Arts inSpiracje
highlights.description: My task was to manage the work related to exhibitions and to oversee the visits of 63 artists from around the world, who presented their work both in galleries and in public urban spaces.

highlights.title: Gallery Curatorial Assistant
highlights.description: I organized and coordinated exhibitions and shows with invited artists such as Piotr Kurka, Sławomir Brzoska, Leszek Knaflewski, Aleksandra Ska and Marek Targoński.

education.title: University of the Arts Poznan Faculty of Multimedia Communications
education.field: Art Of Image Registration with major in Photography

contact.name: Contact
contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.intro: I'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question about my work, want to discuss a project, or just want to say hello – drop me a message. Every conversation starts with a simple hello, and I'm always excited to connect with fellow art lovers and photography enthusiasts.

introExtended.heading: Let's talk!
introExtended.subtext: Share your thoughts, ideas, or simply say hi.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us about your project or inquiry...

form.success: Thank you for your message. We'll get back to you soon!

validation.nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.messageMin: Message must be at least 10 characters

quotes.text: Photography is a way of feeling, of touching, of loving. What you have caught on film is captured forever... It remembers little things, long after you have forgotten everything.
quotes.author: Aaron Siskind

quotes.text: In photography there is a reality so subtle that it becomes more real than reality.
quotes.author: Alfred Stieglitz

quotes.text: A photograph is a secret about a secret. The more it tells you, the less you know.
quotes.author: Diane Arbus

quotes.text: The camera is an instrument that teaches people how to see without a camera.
quotes.author: Dorothea Lange

quotes.text: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.
quotes.author: Dorothea Lange

quotes.text: A good photograph is one that communicates a fact, touches the heart, and leaves the viewer a changed person.
quotes.author: Irving Penn

quotes.text: The best thing about a picture is that it never changes, even when the people in it do.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.text: You don't take a photograph, you make it.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.text: There are always two people in every picture: the photographer and the viewer.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.text: A portrait is not made in the camera but on either side of it.
quotes.author: Edward Steichen

quotes.text: The whole point of taking pictures is so that you don't have to explain things with words.
quotes.author: Elliott Erwitt

quotes.text: Photography is the story I fail to put into words.
quotes.author: Destin Sparks

quotes.text: Taking pictures is savoring life intensely, every hundredth of a second.
quotes.author: Marc Riboud

quotes.text: The camera makes you forget you're there. It's not like you are hiding but you forget, you are just looking so much.
quotes.author: Annie Leibovitz

quotes.text: If your pictures aren't good enough, you're not close enough.
quotes.author: Robert Capa

quotes.text: Photography is a love affair with life.
quotes.author: Burk Uzzle

quotes.text: All photographs are there to remind us of what we forget.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.text: The picture that you took with your camera is the imagination you want to create with reality.
quotes.author: Scott Lorenzo

quotes.text: Your first 10,000 photographs are your worst.
quotes.author: Henri Cartier-Bresson

quotes.text: We are making photographs to understand what our lives mean to us.
quotes.author: Ralph Hattersley

quotes.text: A thing that you see in my pictures is that I was not afraid to fall in love with these people.
quotes.author: Annie Leibovitz

quotes.text: Photography is an immediate reaction, drawing is a meditation.
quotes.author: Henri Cartier-Bresson

quotes.text: The eye should learn to listen before it looks.
quotes.author: Robert Frank

quotes.text: A great photograph is a full expression of what one feels about what is being photographed.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.text: To me, photography is an art of observation. It's about finding something interesting in an ordinary place.
quotes.author: Elliott Erwitt

quotes.text: Light makes photography. Embrace light. Admire it. Love it. But above all, know light.
quotes.author: George Eastman

quotes.text: In photography, the smallest thing can be a great subject. The little human detail can become a leitmotiv.
quotes.author: Henri Cartier-Bresson

quotes.text: What I like about photographs is that they capture a moment that's gone forever, impossible to reproduce.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.text: The desire to discover, the desire to move, to capture the flavor, three concepts that describe the art of photography.
quotes.author: Helmut Newton

quotes.text: Photography is truth. The cinema is truth twenty-four times per second.
quotes.author: Jean-Luc Godard
